snippet.title: 5-in-1 Arcade Hits - Tetroid Trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer shows a gameplay footage from "Tetroid" a mix of Arkanoid, Pong and a little bit of Tetris.

Tetroid contains single player and multiplayer modes. In the singleplayer, the player must destroy a never-ending flow of blocks that are slowly progressing towards him, by bouncing a ball off these blocks. The game contains many bonuses, like score multipliers, multi-balls, etc...

Multiplayer mode will have to players fight against each other using one PSP in a Pong-like gameplay.
